title: Grilled Chicken Breast with Vegetables
description: Simple, high-protein grilled chicken with seasonal vegetables.
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and minced garlic.
Toss vegetables in olive oil and season lightly.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temp reaches 165°F.
Grill vegetables alongside for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Let chicken rest 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with vegetables.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian meat sauce over pasta.
steps: Finely dice onion, carrot, and celery (soffritto).
Heat olive oil in large pot, sauté soffritto until soft, about 8 minutes.
Add minced garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add ground beef, break up and brown for 5-6 minutes.
Pour in crushed tomatoes, add Italian seasoning. Simmer 25 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain.
Serve pasta topped with sauce and grated parmesan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
description: Quick and colorful Asian-style stir-fry.
steps: Press tofu and cut into cubes. Cook rice according to package.
Heat vegetable oil in wok over high heat.
Add tofu cubes, fry until golden on all sides. Remove and set aside.
Add more oil if needed, stir-fry ginger and garlic for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables, stir-fry 4-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return tofu, add soy sauce and sesame oil. Toss to combine.
Serve over rice.

title: Chicken Tacos
description: Flavorful Mexican-style chicken tacos with fresh toppings.
steps: Season chicken thighs with taco seasoning.
Heat oil in skillet, cook chicken 6-7 minutes per side until done.
Let rest 5 minutes, then slice into strips.
Warm tortillas in dry skillet or microwave.
Dice onion and avocado, chop cilantro.
Assemble tacos with chicken, toppings, sour cream, and lime juice.

title: Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce
description: Pan-seared salmon with creamy lemon dill sauce.
steps: Pat salmon dry, season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in skillet over medium-high. Sear salmon 4 minutes per side.
Remove salmon, set aside.
In same pan, melt butter. Sauté garlic 1 minute.
Add cream, lemon juice, and dill. Simmer 3 minutes until slightly thickened.
Steam or roast asparagus as side.
Serve salmon with sauce drizzled over top.

title: Vegetarian Chili
description: Hearty bean chili packed with vegetables and spices.
steps: Dice onions and bell peppers.
Sauté onions in large pot until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add peppers and garlic, cook 3 more minutes.
Add spices, stir for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add beans (drained), tomatoes, corn, and broth.
Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer 25-30 minutes.
Serve with cornbread, cheese, or sour cream.

title: Beef Stir-Fry with Broccoli
description: Classic Chinese takeout favorite made at home.
steps: Slice beef thinly against the grain. Toss with 1 tbsp soy sauce and cornstarch.
Cut broccoli into florets. Cook rice.
Heat oil in wok over high heat. Sear beef quickly, 2 minutes. Remove.
Add more oil, stir-fry ginger and garlic 30 seconds.
Add broccoli, stir-fry 3-4 minutes. Add splash of water to steam.
Return beef, add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce. Toss well.
Serve immediately over rice.

title: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Arrange alternating slices of tomato and mozzarella on platter.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Curry
description: Aromatic Indian-style chicken curry with warm spices.
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Cook rice.
Blend tomatoes, ginger, and garlic into paste.
Heat oil, sauté diced onions until golden, 8 minutes.
Add curry powder, cook 1 minute.
Add tomato paste, cook 5 minutes until oil separates.
Add chicken, stir to coat. Cook 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer 20 minutes until chicken is cooked.
Stir in garam masala, garnish with cilantro. Serve over rice.

title: Greek Salad
description: Classic Mediterranean salad with feta and olives.
steps: Cut cucumbers and tomatoes into chunks.
Thinly slice red onion.
Combine vegetables in large bowl.
Add olives and crumbled feta on top.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and oregano for dressing.
Drizzle dressing over salad. Toss gently and serve.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlic butter shrimp over linguine.
steps: Cook linguine according to package. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Pat shrimp dry, season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil and 2 tbsp butter in large skillet.
Add shrimp, cook 2 minutes per side. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining butter and garlic, cook 1 minute.
Add wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes.
Toss in pasta, shrimp, and pepper flakes. Add pasta water if needed.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

title: Turkey Meatballs
description: Lean turkey meatballs in marinara sauce.
steps: Mix turkey, breadcrumbs, egg, parmesan, garlic, and seasoning.
Form into 16 meatballs.
Heat oil in large skillet. Brown meatballs on all sides, 6-8 minutes.
Pour marinara sauce over meatballs.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes until meatballs are cooked through.
Garnish with fresh basil. Serve over pasta or with crusty bread.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mixed mushrooms.
steps: Heat broth in saucepan, keep warm.
Sauté mushrooms in 2 tbsp butter until golden. Set aside.
In large pan, sauté diced onion in olive oil until soft.
Add garlic and rice, toast 2 minutes.
Add wine, stir until absorbed.
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly.
Continue 18-20 minutes until rice is creamy but al dente.
Stir in mushrooms, remaining butter, parmesan, and thyme.

title: BBQ Pulled Pork
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork with tangy BBQ sauce.
steps: Mix paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and brown sugar for rub.
Coat pork shoulder with rub on all sides.
Place in slow cooker with vinegar. Cook on low 8 hours.
Remove pork, shred with two forks.
Discard fat from cooking liquid, mix liquid with BBQ sauce.
Toss shredded pork with sauce.
Serve on buns topped with coleslaw.

title: Pad Thai
description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles.
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water 30 minutes. Drain.
Mix fish sauce, tamarind, and sugar for sauce.
Heat oil in wok over high heat. Cook shrimp 2 minutes, remove.
Scramble eggs in wok, break into small pieces.
Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add noodles and sauce.
Toss noodles until coated and slightly charred.
Add shrimp, bean sprouts, half the green onions.
Serve with peanuts, remaining green onions, and lime wedges.

title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
description: Nutritious grain bowl with roasted vegetables and tahini dressing.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F. Cube sweet potatoes.
Toss sweet potatoes and chickpeas with oil and cumin. Roast 25 minutes.
Cook quinoa according to package directions.
Massage kale with a little olive oil until tender.
Whisk tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and 2 tbsp water for dressing.
Assemble bowls: quinoa base, roasted veggies, kale, sliced avocado.
Drizzle with tahini dressing.

title: Eggs Benedict
description: Classic brunch dish with poached eggs and hollandaise.
steps: Melt butter, keep warm. Whisk egg yolks and lemon juice over double boiler.
Slowly drizzle in melted butter while whisking until thick. Season hollandaise.
Bring pot of water to simmer, add vinegar.
Create whirlpool, gently drop eggs one at a time. Poach 3 minutes.
Toast English muffins, warm Canadian bacon in pan.
Assemble: muffin half, bacon, poached egg, hollandaise.
Garnish with chives. Serve immediately.

title: Black Bean Tacos
description: Quick vegetarian tacos with spiced black beans.
steps: Drain and rinse black beans. Heat in pan with cumin and chili powder.
Mash half the beans, leave rest whole for texture.
Warm tortillas in dry skillet.
Dice avocado and red onion, chop cilantro.
Assemble tacos with beans, avocado, onion, salsa, cheese.
Squeeze lime over top, garnish with cilantro.

title: Honey Garlic Salmon
description: Sweet and savory glazed salmon fillets.
steps: Mix honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, ginger, and rice vinegar.
Heat oil in oven-safe skillet. Sear salmon skin-side up 3 minutes.
Flip salmon, pour glaze around fish.
Transfer to 400°F oven, bake 10 minutes, basting once.
Steam or sauté green beans as side.
Serve salmon with glaze spooned over, sprinkle with sesame seeds.

title: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty and nutritious soup with red lentils.
steps: Dice onion, carrots, and celery.
Heat oil in large pot. Sauté vegetables 5 minutes.
Add garlic, cumin, turmeric. Cook 1 minute.
Add rinsed lentils and broth. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat, simmer 25 minutes until lentils are tender.
Use immersion blender for partially smooth texture (optional).
Squeeze in lemon juice, adjust seasoning. Serve with crusty bread.

title: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Japanese-inspired rice bowl with glazed chicken.
steps: Cook rice. Steam broccoli and julienne carrots.
Mix soy sauce, mirin, and brown sugar for teriyaki sauce.
Heat oil in skillet. Cook chicken thighs 6 minutes per side.
Pour sauce over chicken, simmer 5 minutes until glazed and sticky.
Slice chicken into strips.
Assemble bowls: rice, vegetables, sliced chicken.
Drizzle with extra sauce, top with sesame seeds and green onions.

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy chickpea patties in warm pita with tahini sauce.
steps: Drain chickpeas. Pulse in food processor with onion, garlic, parsley, spices.
Form into 12 small patties. Refrigerate 15 minutes.
Mix tahini with lemon juice and water for sauce.
Shallow fry falafel in oil 3 minutes per side until golden.
Dice tomato and cucumber for salad.
Warm pita, fill with falafel, vegetables, and tahini sauce.

title: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
description: Quick pasta with fresh basil pesto and burst tomatoes.
steps: Cook pasta according to package. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Toast pine nuts in dry pan until golden.
Sauté halved cherry tomatoes and garlic in olive oil until blistered.
Drain pasta, toss with pesto and a splash of pasta water.
Add tomatoes, half the parmesan. Toss well.
Serve topped with remaining parmesan, pine nuts, and fresh basil.

title: Korean Beef Bulgogi
description: Sweet and savory marinated Korean BBQ beef.
steps: Slice beef very thin against the grain.
Blend pear, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sugar, and sesame oil for marinade.
Marinate beef at least 30 minutes (or overnight).
Cook rice according to package.
Heat large skillet very hot. Cook beef in batches 2-3 minutes.
Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds.
Serve over rice with kimchi.

title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
description: Juicy chicken breasts stuffed with spinach and feta.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F.
Wilt spinach in pan, squeeze out excess moisture.
Mix spinach, feta, cream cheese, garlic, and sun-dried tomatoes.
Cut pocket in each chicken breast horizontally.
Stuff each breast with spinach-feta mixture. Secure with toothpicks.
Season outside with Italian seasoning, salt, pepper.
Sear in oven-safe skillet 3 minutes per side.
Transfer to oven, bake 15-18 minutes until cooked through.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: Quick Asian-style fried rice with mixed vegetables.
steps: Use day-old cold rice for best results.
Dice carrots small, slice green onions.
Heat wok over high heat with vegetable oil.
Scramble eggs, break into pieces, set aside.
Stir-fry carrots 2 minutes, add peas and garlic.
Add rice, toss and press against wok to crisp slightly.
Add soy sauce, eggs, green onions. Toss well.
Drizzle with sesame oil before serving.

title: Baked Cod with Herbs
description: Light and flaky baked cod with lemon herb topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F. Place cod in baking dish.
Mix breadcrumbs, herbs, garlic, melted butter, and lemon zest.
Season cod with salt and pepper, drizzle with olive oil.
Top cod with breadcrumb mixture, pressing gently.
Bake 15-18 minutes until fish flakes easily.
Steam green beans as side.
Serve with lemon wedges.

title: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling Tex-Mex chicken with peppers and onions.
steps: Slice chicken into strips. Mix cumin, chili powder, paprika with salt.
Toss chicken with spice mix.
Slice peppers and onion into strips.
Heat oil in large skillet over high heat.
Cook chicken 5-6 minutes until done. Remove.
Sauté peppers and onions 4-5 minutes until slightly charred.
Return chicken, squeeze lime juice over.
Serve with warm tortillas, sour cream, and guacamole.

title: Minestrone Soup
description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans.
steps: Dice all vegetables into small pieces.
Heat oil in large pot. Sauté onion, carrots, celery 5 minutes.
Add garlic and zucchini, cook 2 more minutes.
Add tomatoes, broth, beans, Italian seasoning, and parmesan rind.
Bring to boil, simmer 20 minutes.
Add pasta, cook until al dente, about 10 minutes.
Remove parmesan rind. Serve with extra parmesan and crusty bread.

title: Grilled Steak with Chimichurri
description: Perfectly grilled steak with fresh Argentine herb sauce.
steps: Make chimichurri: blend parsley, cilantro, garlic, vinegar, oregano, pepper flakes.
Stir in olive oil. Let sit 20 minutes for flavors to meld.
Bring steak to room temperature. Season generously with salt and pepper.
Grill over high heat 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Rest steak 5 minutes before slicing.
Slice against the grain, serve with chimichurri spooned over.

title: Thai Green Curry
description: Creamy coconut curry with vegetables and your choice of protein.
steps: Cook jasmine rice according to package.
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces, slice bell pepper.
Heat oil in wok, fry curry paste 1 minute until fragrant.
Add coconut cream (thick part), stir until oil separates.
Add chicken, cook 5 minutes.
Pour in remaining coconut milk, bamboo shoots, bell pepper.
Simmer 10 minutes. Season with fish sauce and sugar.
Stir in Thai basil. Serve over jasmine rice.

title: Shakshuka
description: Middle Eastern eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce.
steps: Dice onion and bell pepper.
Heat oil in large skillet. Sauté onion and pepper 5 minutes.
Add garlic and spices, cook 1 minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes, simmer 10 minutes until thickened.
Make 6 wells in sauce, crack an egg into each.
Cover, cook 8-10 minutes until whites are set, yolks still runny.
Top with crumbled feta and cilantro.
Serve with crusty bread for dipping.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad with grilled chicken and creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Grill 6-7 minutes per side.
Let chicken rest 5 minutes, then slice.
Make dressing: whisk mayo, lemon juice, garlic, anchovy paste, Worcestershire.
Thin dressing with a little olive oil if needed.
Chop romaine into bite-sized pieces.
Toss lettuce with dressing, most of the parmesan, and croutons.
Top with sliced chicken and remaining parmesan.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Creamy Indian tomato-based chicken curry.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, turmeric, and half the garam masala for 30 mins.
Cook rice. Grill or pan-fry chicken until charred. Set aside.
Melt butter in pan, sauté ginger-garlic paste 2 minutes.
Add tomato puree, chili powder, remaining garam masala. Simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in cream, add cooked chicken. Simmer 10 more minutes.
Finish with a pat of butter.
Serve with rice and warm naan.

title: Tuna Poke Bowl
description: Hawaiian-style raw tuna bowl with rice and toppings.
steps: Cook sushi rice, season with rice vinegar.
Cube tuna into 1-inch pieces.
Toss tuna with soy sauce, sesame oil, and sliced green onions.
Let marinate 10 minutes.
Slice avocado and cucumber.
Cook edamame according to package.
Assemble bowls: rice base, tuna, avocado, cucumber, edamame.
Drizzle with sriracha mayo, sprinkle sesame seeds.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant baked with marinara and melted cheese.
steps: Slice eggplant into 1/2-inch rounds. Salt and let drain 20 minutes.
Pat dry. Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs with parmesan.
Bread each slice: flour, egg, breadcrumbs.
Shallow fry in olive oil until golden, 3 minutes per side. Drain.
Spread thin layer of marinara in baking dish.
Layer eggplant, marinara, mozzarella. Repeat layers.
Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Top with fresh basil before serving.

title: One-Pan Lemon Herb Chicken and Potatoes
description: Easy sheet pan dinner with roasted chicken and potatoes.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Halve potatoes, smash garlic cloves.
Toss potatoes with 2 tbsp oil, garlic, salt, pepper on sheet pan.
Nestle chicken thighs among potatoes, skin-side up.
Drizzle chicken with remaining oil, season well.
Add lemon slices, rosemary, and thyme on top.
Pour broth around (not over) chicken.
Roast 40 minutes until chicken is crispy and potatoes are tender.
